pkgmetadata.longdescription: Read Data from Files Readable by 'gnumeric' // Read data files readable by 'gnumeric' into 'R'. Can read whole sheet or a range, from several file formats, including the native format of 'gnumeric'. Reading is done by using 'ssconvert' (a file converter utility included in the 'gnumeric' distribution http://www.gnumeric.org) to convert the requested part to CSV. From 'gnumeric' files (but not other formats) can list sheet names and sheet sizes or read all sheets.
